AppAutoUpdate.title: Enable Auto Updates
AppAutoUpdate.description: (AppAutoUpdate)-Enable or disable automatic application update. If set to true, application updates are installed without user approval within Firefox. The operating system might still require approval. If set to false, application updates are downloaded but the user can choose when to install the update. If you have disabled updates via DisableAppUpdate, this policy has no effect

AppUpdateURL.title: Custom App Update URL
AppUpdateURL.description: (AppUpdateURL)-Change the URL for application update if you are providing Firefox updates from a custom update server

AllowNonFQDN.title: Allow non Fully Qualified Domain Names

PrivateBrowsing.title: Allow Integrated Authentication in Private Browsing

CaptivePortal.title: Detect Captive Portals
CaptivePortal.description: (CaptivePortal)-Enable or disable the detection of captive portals

Install.title: Certificates to Install
Install.description: (Install)-Install certificates into the Firefox certificate store. If only a filename is specified, Firefox searches for the file in /Library/Application Support/Mozilla/Certificates and ~/Library/Application Support/Mozilla/Certificates

DisableSetDesktopBackground.title: Disable Set As Desktop Background Feature
DisableSetDesktopBackground.description: (DisableSetDesktopBackground)-Remove the Set As Desktop Background... menuitem when right clicking on an image

DisableMasterPasswordCreation.title: Disable Master Password Creation
DisableMasterPasswordCreation.description: (DisableMasterPasswordCreation)-If this value is true, it works the same as setting PrimaryPassword to false and removes the primary password functionality. If both DisableMasterPasswordCreation and PrimaryPassword are used, DisableMasterPasswordCreation takes precedent

DisableBuiltinPDFViewer.title: Disable Built-in PDF Viewer
DisableBuiltinPDFViewer.description: (DisableBuiltinPDFViewer)-Disable the built in PDF viewer. PDF files are downloaded and sent externally

DisableFeedbackCommands.title: Disable Reporting Site Feedback
DisableFeedbackCommands.description: (DisableFeedbackCommands)-Disable the menus for reporting sites (Submit Feedback, Report Deceptive Site)

DisableFormHistory.title: Disable Form History
DisableFormHistory.description: (DisableFormHistory)-Turn off saving information on web forms and the search bar

DisablePasswordReveal.title: Disable Password Reveal
DisablePasswordReveal.description: (DisablePasswordReveal)-Do not allow passwords to be shown in saved logins

DisablePocket.title: Disable Pocket
DisablePocket.description: (DisablePocket)-Remove Pocket in the Firefox UI. It does not remove it from the new tab page

DisableProfileImport.title: Disable Import Profile
DisableProfileImport.description: (DisableProfileImport)-Disables the Import data from another browser option in the bookmarks window

DisableProfileRefresh.title: Disable Profile Refresh
DisableProfileRefresh.description: (DisableProfileRefresh)-Disable the Refresh Firefox button on about:support and support.mozilla.org, as well as the prompt that displays offering to refresh Firefox when you haven't used it in a while

DisplayBookmarksToolbar.title: Display Bookmarks Toolbar
DisplayBookmarksToolbar.description: (DisplayBookmarksToolbar)-Set the initial state of the bookmarks toolbar. A user can still hide it and it will stay hidden

DontCheckDefaultBrowser.title: Do Not Check Default Browser Settings
DontCheckDefaultBrowser.description: (DontCheckDefaultBrowser)-Don't check if Firefox is the default browser at startup

ExtensionSettings.title: Extensions Settings
ExtensionSettings.description: By default, this defines Extension settings for all extensions. If you need to specificy specific extension permissions add them as unique JSON objects

allowed_types.title: Allowed Extension Types
allowed_types.description: extension, theme, dictionary, locale are supported

LocalFileLinks.title: Local File Links
LocalFileLinks.description: (LocalFileLinks)-Enable linking to local files by origin

PrimaryPassword.title: Require Primary Password
PrimaryPassword.description: (PrimaryPassword)-If this value is true, a primary password is required. If this value is false, it works the same as if DisableMasterPasswordCreation was true and removes the primary password functionality

NoDefaultBookmarks.title: Disable the Creation of Default Bookmarks
NoDefaultBookmarks.description: (NoDefaultBookmarks)-This policy is only effective if the user profile has not been created yet

OfferToSaveLogins.title: Offer to Save Logins
OfferToSaveLogins.description: (OfferToSaveLogins)-Control whether or not Firefox offers to save passwords

OfferToSaveLoginsDefault.title: Offer to Save Logins Default Value (Mutable)

OverrideFirstRunPage.title: Override First Run Page
OverrideFirstRunPage.description: (OverrideFirstRunPage)-Override the first run page. If the value is an empty string the first run page is not displayed. Starting with Firefox 83, Firefox ESR 78.5, you can also specify multiple URLS separated by a vertical bar (|)

PasswordManagerEnabled.title: Enable Password Manager
PasswordManagerEnabled.description: (PasswordManagerEnabled)-Remove access to the password manager via preferences and blocks about:logins on Firefox 70

EnablePermissions.title: Enable Permissions
EnablePermissions.description: (EnablePermissions)-If EnablePermissions is set to true, the built-in PDF viewer will honor document permissions like preventing the copying of text

UseHTTPProxyForAllProtocols.title: Use HTTP Proxy for all Protocols

RequestedLocales.title: Requested Localizations
RequestedLocales.description: (RequestedLocales)-Set the the list of requested locales for the application in order of preference. It will cause the corresponding language pack to become active

SanitizeOnShutdown.title: Santize on Shutdown (All)
SanitizeOnShutdown.description: (SanitizeOnShutdown)-Clear all data on shutdown, including Browsing & Download History, Cookies, Active Logins, Cache, Form & Search History, Site Preferences and Offline Website Data

SearchBar.title: Search Bar
SearchBar.description: (SearchBar)-Set whether or not search bar is displayed.

PreventInstalls.title: Prevent installing search engines from webpages

Add.title: Add up to five search engines (ESR Only)

SSLVersionMax.title: Maxmimum SSL Version
SSLVersionMax.description: (SSLVersionMax)-Set and lock the maximum version of TLS
